features: TARGETED NECK CONTOURING CREAM: Developed with Dermatologists & Plastic Surgeons, this moisturizer works at each layer of skin’s surface to visibly firm, lift & contour face, neck + jawline. Powered by Hyaluronic Acid to visibly plump and formulated with Retinol and Swertiamarin to visibly firm and re-volumize skin’s surface.

PROVEN RESULTS: In a clinical study, 100% participants had instantly hydrated skin. In just 1 week, horizontal neck lines were visibly reduced by 50%. After 1 week, 97% had a visibly firmer face & neck. Dermatologist tested. Fragrance-free. Paraben-free. Non-comedogenic.
ANTI-AGING FORMULAS: Whether you're looking for a solution for deep wrinkles, fine lines, dark circles, crow's feet, uneven skin tone or dry skin, we have an anti-aging formula that's right for you.

SCIENCE & BEAUTY: We produce a wide array of skin care products & treatments including daily moisturizers with SPF, hyaluronic and niacinamide acids, facial cleansers, vitamin C serums, retinol skin tone & wrinkle regimens & creams for under eyes, neck firming, decollete & much more.

SKIN CARE INNOVATION: Our products are recognized by beauty industry leaders & dermatologists for their best-in-class effectiveness. We continue to research & innovate new formulas for healthier skin.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: RoC has been revolutionizing skincare since 1957 when Dr. Jean-Charles Lissarrague, a French pharmacist at the Rogé Cavaillès pharmacy, created the first hypoallergenic skincare formulations. Dr. Lissarrague believed in innovative skincare solutions, based on science, to help women look and feel their best at every age . For more than 60 years, that has been the foundational philosophy at RoC, inspiring a history of firsts. By combining retinol with other ingredients like Vitamin E and using innovative packaging, RoC made it possible for daily use.

For more than 60 years, that has been the foundational philosophy at RoC, inspiring a history of firsts. By combining retinol with other ingredients like Vitamin E and using innovative packaging, RoC made it possible for daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great night-time moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful texture, lightweight yet deeply penetrating moisture. Plumps the skin. Great for layering on top of serum.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Thirsty Dry Skin
reviews.reviewText: RoC Has been around for a long time and should get some love just for that, it has competed against many new brands and older ones alike but seems to always come out on top! RoC has amazing products that are great for over 50 women/men. They (I think) were the 1st to come out with OTC retinol at affordable prices for our budget-conscious people. I looked at many neck/face creams prior to purchasing this, happy I did! It provides wonderful hydration for my dry thirsty skin. When I wake up in the morning my skin feels soft and hydrated, I love that it no longer feels tight. Great products especially if you are a mature (okay very mature) person such as myself with severely dry and thirsty skin, I will be buying their day cream next and looking forward to it, as it stands now I use their retinol eye cream and this neck/face cream and they both are marvelous products, I have used their retinol serum in the past and it's just as good as the more pricey OTC retinol serums without feeling dry and tight, if anything their retinol products have majorly hydrated my skin, thanks RoC for keeping it real! I would say you rock, but you know that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not sure if it's doing anything
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure if it's working to be honest. I think this plus the vitamin C I am using is helping, so it's more the combo of the two that has seemed to help. My skin has gotten better. And, at the very least, I can say that this product hasn't broken me out. But, i think there are less expensive options that can give you the same result

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed!
reviews.reviewText: I can't say for sure if my neck is getting firmer but I'm realistic and understand this will be more of a proactive approach in my skin routine. I chose this neck cream because it states it's unscented. I have had creams in the past that smelled too strong and I can't wear them. This neck cream is truly unscented. It's exactly what I needed. It's thin enough I can apply it easily and evenly to my entire neck and under my chin. It's not greasy or sticky. So far I love everything about this product and am realistic about creams performing miracles!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The product it self felt nice on my face it was nice and soft feeling. The problem with this is that it didn’t work as need. This didn’t tighten up my neck at all. Would not buy again kind of a waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy it. It works.
reviews.reviewText: Been using RoC less than a week. Inexpensive and it works to reduce face, neck, and chest wrinkles. Been using it twice a day. Apply with upward strokes starting at the chest area and/or base of the neck. Work towards the cheeks and around the eyes. Upward strokes above the brow line and temples.It's a deep Moisturizer that dries feeling soft.Not greasy. OK to use outdoors during the day too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been a ROC fan for many years, but only ever used the daily moisturizer. However, I know also use this and it keeps all that it promises! I have seen a marked difference in the skin on my neck and face. I am 70 years old and didn’t expect that to the degree it actually happened. I can only recommend this cream, it leaves your skin so soft, doesn’t smell and the price is awesome!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I absolutely love these products
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love these products by roc!!!. Unfortunately, I had to stop buying them due to the ever growing increase in the economy. I had to look for something more affordable.

reviews.reviewTitle: Product great but it’s a set of 2 and not 3 items
reviews.reviewText: Product application feels great! Yet to see the results though. But what was slightly disappointing was that the product description mentioned that it’s a set of 3 but I only received the contour cream jar and the eye cream sachet. Where is the 3rd item? Seller please respond. Thanks
